summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.1°C) and outside temperature (up 1.6°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8635 lux) and cloud levels (up 327 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14073 lux), cloud levels (up 1907 m), outside temperature (up 2.0°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 327.2m lower than yesterday, 825.3m lower than the past week, 1906.6m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 739.8m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1565.1m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air and little or no wind. Periods of rain anticipated, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and light levels will be low during the day. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
